Class Clock

java.lang.Object
  Clock

public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a way to override the system time. Useful for unit-testing purposes.

Constructor Summary
Clock()
           
 
Method Summary
static void clearTime()
          Clears the time.
static long getTime()
          Returns the system time if no time has been explicitely set using setTime(...)
static void setTime(long time)
          Sets the time.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Clock

public Clock()
Method Detail

clearTime

public static void clearTime()
Clears the time. This will cause getTime() to return the system time.

getTime

public static long getTime()
Returns the system time if no time has been explicitely set using setTime(...)

setTime

public static void setTime(long time)
Sets the time. This will cause getTime() to return the given time instead of the system time.
